awd_titl_txt: PYI:  Optical Network Based on Pulse-Modulated Subcarrier   Multiplexed Transmission
awd_abstract_narration: The current research interests of the nominee are:                                                                                                              1.  high speed optoelectronic devices in the millimeter wave                    frequencies.                                                                                                                                                    2.  architecture of lightwave networks based on partially tunable               lasers.                                                                                                                                                         3.  wavelength tunable optical devices for multi-access lightwave               networks.                                                                                                                                                       4.  non-linear optical techniques for producing high pwoer                      semiconductor laser sources and for dense optical switching networks.
org_div_long_name: Division of Electrical, Communications and Cyber Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE TRUSTEES OF COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY IN THE CITY OF NEW YORK
